mapper.sql: select bt.check_id, bt.bill_id, bt.workflow_id, bt.workflow_name, bt.workflow_group_id, bt.workflow_step_id, bt.workflow_step_node_id, bt.workflow_node_id, bt.checker_user_id, bt.checker_user_name, bt.checker_dept_name, bt.checker_user_post, bt.check_status, bt.check_remarks, bt.check_attachment_path, bt.create_by, bt.create_time
mapper.insert:
insert into workflow_bill_trace
bill_id, workflow_id, workflow_name, workflow_group_id, workflow_step_id, workflow_step_node_id, workflow_node_id, checker_user_id, checker_user_name, checker_dept_name, checker_user_post, check_status, check_remarks, check_attachment_path, create_by, create_time,
#{billId}, #{workflowId}, #{workflowName}, #{workflowGroupId}, #{workflowStepId}, #{workflowStepNodeId}, #{workflowNodeId}, #{checkerUserId}, #{checkerUserName}, #{checkerDeptName}, #{checkerUserPost}, #{checkStatus}, #{checkRemarks}, #{checkAttachmentPath}, #{createBy}, #{createTime},
mapper.delete:
delete from workflow_bill_trace where check_id in
#{checkId}
mapper.insert:
insert into workflow_bill_trace ( bill_id, workflow_id, workflow_name, workflow_group_id, workflow_step_id, workflow_step_node_id, workflow_node_id, checker_user_id, checker_user_name, checker_dept_name, checker_user_post, check_status, check_remarks, check_attachment_path, create_by, create_time) values
( #{item.billId}, #{item.workflowId}, #{item.workflowName}, #{item.workflowGroupId}, #{item.workflowStepId}, #{item.workflowStepNodeId}, #{item.workflowNodeId}, #{item.checkerUserId}, #{item.checkerUserName}, #{item.checkerDeptName}, #{item.checkerUserPost}, #{item.checkStatus}, #{item.checkRemarks}, #{item.checkAttachmentPath}, #{item.createBy}, #{item.createTime})
mapper.select: select bt.check_id, bt.bill_id, bt.workflow_id, bt.workflow_name, bt.workflow_group_id, bt.workflow_step_id, bt.workflow_step_node_id, bt.workflow_node_id, bt.checker_user_id, su.nick_name as checker_user_name , bt.checker_dept_name, bt.checker_user_post, bt.check_status, bt.check_remarks, bt.check_attachment_path, bt.create_by, bt.create_time ,swnc.workflow_node_name as workflowNodeName from workflow_bill_trace bt left join sys_workflow_node_checker swnc on swnc.workflow_node_id = bt.workflow_node_id left join sys_user su on su.user_name = bt.checker_user_name where bt.bill_id = #{billId}
